title: Organic Fertilizer (Liquid)
description: 100% organic liquid fertilizer for healthier plants and improved yields. Suitable for vegetables and ornamentals.

title: Insecticide (Broad-spectrum)
description: Broad-spectrum insecticide for common crop pests. Follow label instructions and safety guidelines.

title: Plant Growth Promoter
description: Natural growth promoter to boost root and shoot development. Use as a foliar spray.

title: Tomato Hybrid Seeds (100g)
description: High-yield hybrid tomato seeds suited for long-season cultivation. Pack size: 100g.

title: Potato Seed Tubers (1kg)
description: Certified seed tubers for early and main-season potato crops. Sold per kg.

title: Bio-Compost (50kg)
description: Well-decomposed organic compost to improve soil structure and fertility. Bag weight: 50kg.

title: Neem Oil (1L)
description: Cold-pressed neem oil for organic pest management and foliar application. Effective against many sap-sucking pests.

title: Mulch Film (5m roll)
description: UV-stabilized mulch film for moisture conservation and weed suppression. Roll length: 5 meters.

title: Drip Irrigation Starter Kit
description: Basic drip irrigation starter kit for small plots (includes mainline tubing, emitters, and connectors).

title: Soil Test Kit (Field)
description: Portable soil test kit for pH, N, P, K estimates. Useful for quick on-field assessments.

title: Agricultural Gloves (Pair)
description: Durable, chemical-resistant gloves suitable for spraying and handling fertilizers.

title: Mixed Vegetable Seed Pack
description: Assorted seeds pack for kitchen gardens: tomato, chilli, bhindi, and coriander. Approximate quantity per pack.

title: Hand Sprayer (5L)
description: Manual 5-litre knapsack/shoulder sprayer for small farms and gardens. Lightweight and easy to use.
